mapper.insert: INSERT INTO show_present (show_present_code, show_place_code, movie_code, show_date, show_time, show_minute) VALUES (show_present_seq.NEXTVAL,#{show_place_code},#{movie_code},#{show_date},#{show_time},#{show_minute})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM show_present, movie, show_place WHERE show_present_code = #{show_present_code} AND show_present.movie_code = movie.movie_code AND show_present.show_place_code = show_place.show_place_code
select distinct movie_code from show_present where show_date >= sysdate
